title: Statewide rents-to-income ratio map
text:
Project Description: A statewide map comparing the median home price in every jurisdiction to metropolitan household income. Price to income ratios over 10 are considered exclusionary.
Source: Incomes are derived from the 2022 5-year ACS. Home values are derived from 2023 Automated Valuation Models for individual properties, aggregated to the Census Place via AEIâ€™s Walkable Oriented Development map. ACS Place home values are also included.

Home Values to Income
